articles.description: It was one year ago today when Michael O'Neill was appointed Stoke City manager
articles.content:
It says a lot just to know that Michael ONeill is the first in four Stoke City managers to make it to a first anniversary. 
A club which was renowned for its stability had suddenly had five bosses i… [+6965 chars]

articles.title: Arsenal transfer business paved way for Liverpool to sign Diogo Jota - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: The impact of COVID-19 on finances at football clubs won't stop the biggest clubs from splashing the cash
articles.content:
When Arsenal signed Nicolas Pépé from Lille last season for a fee of £72m it raised plenty of eyebrows.
Firstly because the fee seemed to vastly overvalue the Ivorian, something that Fenway Sports G… [+7251 chars]
